resources.string: Doctor Recommendation: “Low carbohydrate food kept things nicely controlled.Try some low-GI snacks e.g. cheese on Vita Wheats or fruit (banana, berries etc.).”

Choose carefully and avoid large serves\n\nAmber food and drinks should be selected carefully and eaten in moderation. Although items in the amber category provide some important nutrients, they can also cause you to eat too much energy (kilojoules) and be higher in saturated fats, sugar and salt.

Doctor Recommendation: “Main issue is the high sugars after lunch and dinner, White flour-based bread and pizza base are causing problems, consider multigrain bread and a healthier choice. Try for 20 minutes extra exercise of moderate level per day.”
